parameters.text:
=You are a professional HR coordinator. Write a warm and encouraging email to a job applicant who has successfully reached the final interview stage. Use the following details: - Name: {{ $json.applicant_name }} - Interview Date: {{ $json.meeting_datetime }} - Meeting Link: Google Meeting Link - HR Nname: Flow Pilot HR Team Include the following: 1. Congratulate the applicant for reaching the final interview. 2. Express enthusiasm about potentially working together. 3. Provide the interview schedule and meeting link. 4. Encourage them to be prepared and confident. Write in a polite, professional, and motivational tone. Keep it concise but positive. The output should be a well structured html email. In email body use break tags
instead of \n. Output only the string email body without notation like "```html ```"

assignments.name: meeting_datetime
assignments.value: ={{    new Date(new Date($today).getTime() + 4 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000)     .toLocaleString('en-US', {       weekday: 'long',       year: 'numeric',       month: 'long',       day: 'numeric',       hour: 'numeric',       minute: '2-digit',       hour12: true,       timeZone: 'Asia/Manila'     })  }}

parameters.text:
=As a professional HR coordinator, your task is to compose a warm and encouraging thank-you email to a job applicant. Email Objective: Acknowledge their application and express gratitude. Encourage them to schedule an interview at their earliest convenience. The option is a JotForm appointment template link. Use the following input parameters: - Applicant Name: {{$('Initial Interview').item.json.From?.match(/^(.*?)(\s*<.*>)?$/)?.[1]?.trim().toTitleCase() ?? "Applicant" }} - hr_coordinator_name: Flow Pilot HR Team - Jot_Form_link: https://form.jotform.com/252171015127445 - company_name: Flow Pilot Output Format: Generate the email body only. Ensure the tone is professional yet friendly and inviting. The output should be a well structured html email. In email body use break tags
instead of \n. Output only the string email body without notation like "```html ```" Example of Expected Output (using placeholder data): Body: Dear [Applicant Name], Thank you so much for your interest in the [Job Title] position at [Company Name] and for submitting your application! We appreciate you taking the time to apply. We were impressed with your qualifications and would love to invite you for an interview to discuss your experience further and tell you more about this exciting opportunity. To make scheduling easy for you, please book via JotForm: [JotForm Link] Please select a time that works best for you. If you have any questions before your interview, feel free to reply to this email. We look forward to speaking with you soon! Best regards, [HR Coordinator Name] HR Coordinator [Company Name]

assignments.name: raw_email
raw_email

parameters.text:
=As a helpful HR Assistant Bot, your task is to generate a brief and informative summary message about a job applicant, specifically formatted for a Discord channel. The message should quickly convey key details to the recruitment team.

Message Objective:
Announce an update on an existing applicant.

Summarize essential details about the applicant and their application.

Provide quick links for team members to access more information.

Be concise and easy to read within a Discord chat environment.

Input Parameters:
applicant_name: {{ $('Meeting Details').item.json.applicant_name }}

job_title: "Automation Specialist"

email:{{ $('Set Email Variables1').item.json.email_to}}

application_status: "Final Interview Scheduled"

Details: {{ $('Meeting Details').item.json.meeting_datetime }}

Meeting Link: {{ $('Meeting Details').item.json.meeting_link }}

key_qualifications: A very brief, one-sentence summary or a few keywords highlighting their most relevant qualifications or experience (e.g., "5+ years in digital marketing, strong SEO skills", or "Excellent communication, project management experience").



Output Format:
Generate a single string containing the complete Discord message. Use Discord's Markdown for formatting (e.g., **bold**, *italics*, _underline_, \code``) and consider using relevant emojis for visual clarity.


Example of Expected Output (using placeholder data):
üóìÔ∏è **Interview Scheduled!** üóìÔ∏è

**Applicant:** John Doe
**Email:** sample@gmail.com
**Role:** Senior Software Engineer
**Status:** Interview Scheduled
**Details:** Monday, August 12th at 10:00 AM PST
**Meeting Link:** https://meet.google.com/abc-xyz

=You are a professional HR coordinator. Write a warm and encouraging rejection email to a job applicant who reached the final interview stage. Use the following details: Name: {{$('Negative').item.json.From?.match(/^(.?)(\s<.*>)?$/)?.[1]?.trim() ?? $('Negative').item.json.snippet?.match(/Initial Interview with\s+(\w+)/i)?.[1] ?? "Applicant" }} HR Name: Flow Pilot HR Team Include the following: Thank the applicant for participating in the interview process. Gently inform them that they were not selected for the role. Offer encouragement for their career journey. Leave the door open for future opportunities if appropriate. Write in a polite, professional, and supportive tone. Keep it concise but warm. The output should be a well-structured HTML email. In the email body, use
tags instead of \n. Output only the string email body, with no code fences like ```html or markdown notation.

parameters.text:
=As a helpful HR Assistant Bot, your task is to generate a brief and informative summary message about a job applicant, specifically formatted for a Discord channel. The message should quickly convey key details to the recruitment team.

Message Objective:
Announce a new applicant or an update on an existing applicant.

Summarize essential details about the applicant and their application.

Provide quick links for team members to access more information.

Be concise and easy to read within a Discord chat environment.

Input Parameters (to be provided by N8N workflow):
applicant_name: {{ $('Convert form response to JSON').item.json['Full Name'] }}

job_title: {{ $('Convert form response to JSON').item.json['Interested Services'] }}

email:{{ $('Convert form response to JSON').item.json['Email Address'] }}

Contact Number: {{ $('Convert form response to JSON').item.json['Contact Number'] }}

Address: {{ $('Convert form response to JSON').item.json.Address }}

application_status: "New Application Received"

meeeting_date: {{ $('Create Calendar Invite using HTTP').item.json.start.dateTime }} {{ $('Create Calendar Invite using HTTP').item.json.start.timeZone }}

meeeting_link: {{ $('Create Calendar Invite using HTTP').item.json.hangoutLink }}

Output Format:
Generate a single string containing the complete Discord message. Use Discord's Markdown for formatting (e.g., **bold**, *italics*, _underline_, \code``) and consider using relevant emojis for visual clarity.


Example of Expected Output (using placeholder data):
‚ú® **New Applicant Alert!** ‚ú®

**Applicant:** Sarah Lee
**Email:** jl@gmail.com
**Phone:** (099) 550-7241
**Address:** Binan City, Laguna
**Role:** Marketing Specialist
**Status:** New Application Received
**Interview Date:** Friday, Aug 08, 2025 08:00-09:00 Asia/Manila (GMT+08:00)


---

parameters.content:
# üìå Initial Interview Workflow

1. **Trigger**  
   When a label **"Initial Interview"** is added in Gmail (polling every 30 minutes).

2. **HTTP Node** ‚Äì Send a thank-you email via Gmail API  
   - Include **JotForm appointment template link**  

3. **HTTP Node** ‚Äì Once booked, create Google Meet & Calendar invite  
   - Invite the candidate  
   - Invite your calendar email

4. **HTTP Node** ‚Äì Log to **Google Sheets** (`Initial` tab)

5. **AI Agent** ‚Äì Create a **Discord summary message**

6. **HTTP Node** ‚Äì Send to **Discord webhook** (`Initial` channel)

# üìå Final Interview & Assessment Workflow

1. **Trigger**  
   Gmail label **"Final Interview"** (polling every 30 minutes).

2. **AI Agent** ‚Äì Generate message confirming final round

3. **HTTP Node** ‚Äì Send email with **assessment link**

4. **HTTP Node** ‚Äì Create new Calendar invite with Google Meet  
   - Schedule **4 days after the trigger date**  
     > Example: If trigger date is **Aug 4**, the Google Meet date must be **Aug 8**  
   - Send invite to **final interviewer** and **candidate**

5. **HTTP Node** ‚Äì Append to **Final** Google Sheet

6. **AI Agent** ‚Äì Generate Discord message 

7. **HTTP Node** ‚Äì Send Discord message to **Final Interview** channel

# üìå Negative Workflow

1. **Trigger**  
   Gmail label **"Negative"** (polling every 30 minutes).

2. **AI Agent** ‚Äì Draft a respectful rejection message

3. **HTTP Node** ‚Äì Send email via Gmail API

4. **HTTP Node** ‚Äì Log candidate info to **Negative** Google Sheet

json.snippet: Initial Interview with Jl Pastorin Tinanggihan ni jhonloyd pastorin ang imbitasyong ito. Sumali gamit ang Google Meet Link ng meeting meet.google.com/fmt-tftz-ttb Initial interview with the candidate.
json.Subject: Tinanggihan: Initial Interview with Jl Pastorin @ Biy 8 Ago 2025 8AM - 9AM (GMT+8) (jhonloydpastorin.030303@gmail.com)

json.snippet: Hi Gab, I confirm that I have received the instructions and will proceed with the assessment. Thank you! Noong Lun, Ago 4, 2025 nang 3:17 PM, sinulat ni Flow Pilot <flowpilot25@gmail.com> ang: Hi
json.Subject: Re: Automation specialist

json.output:
Dear Jl,


Thank you very much for taking the time to participate in our interview process. We truly appreciate your interest in the role and the effort you put into each stage.


After careful consideration, we have decided to move forward with another candidate for this position. This decision was not an easy one, given the strong pool of applicants, including yourself.


We encourage you to continue pursuing your career goals with confidence and enthusiasm. Your skills and experience are valuable, and we believe you have a bright future ahead.


Please know that we would be happy to consider your application for any suitable opportunities that may arise in the future.


Thank you again for your time and understanding. We wish you all the best in your career journey.


Sincerely,
Flow Pilot HR Team

main.node: Trigger Webhook when user books a meeting
